cause.description:
The Southcoast Mentoring Initiative for Learning, Education and Service is a coalition of caring people and organizations from around the Southcoast region of Massachusetts dedicated to creating quality mentoring matches for the children of the area.
The mission of the SouthCoast Mentoring Initiatives for Learning Education and Service (SMILES) Organization is to help at risk children realize their personal and educational potential through a large scale one-on-one mentoring program.
1. Every child deserves at least one competent, caring adult in their life.
cause.mission: To provide a mentor for every child who needs one.
cause.name: Helping youth in the Southcoast of Massachusetts
